Package edu.bu.pas.othello.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
edu.bu.pas.othello.game.Game
public class Game extends Object
A class representing the Othello game. This class has a Board inside it and keeps track of state information such as the number of turns, the agent's controlling each player, the number of strikes each agent has, etc.
See Also:
  • Board
  • Coordinate
  • PlayerType
  • Direction
